roleset.name: make forget learning

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` And God help anyone who tries [*]to unteach you '' ! ! Grumbled [*T*-3] Michelangelo ; ; yet he knew that he had nothing [0] [*] to grumble about [*T*-4] , for Argiento made few demands on him .

roleset.note: UNTEACH-V NOTES: frames created by Ben. c.f. 'teach'. No Vncls. (from unteach.01-v)
